verses.verse: And <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela<s%> his first-born, <S%H788>Ashbel<s%> the <S%H8145>second,<s%> <S%H315>Aharah<s%> the <S%H7992>third,<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H261>Ehud:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of fathers' [households] of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1387>Geba,<s%> and they <S%H1540>carried<s%> them into <S%H1540>exile<s%> to <S%H9273>Manahath,<s%>

namely, <S%H5283>Naaman,<s%> <S%H281>Ahijah,<s%> and <S%H1617>Gera<s%> â€“ he <S%H1540>carried<s%> them into <S%H1540>exile;<s%> and he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5798>Uzza<s%> and <S%H284>Ahihud.<s%>

And <S%H7842>Shaharaim<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of children in the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H4480>after<s%> he had <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H7971>away<s%> <S%H2366>Hushim<s%> and <S%H1199>Baara<s%> his <S%H802>wives.<s%>
And by <S%H2321>Hodesh<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3103>Jobab,<s%> <S%H6644>Zibia,<s%> <S%H4331>Mesha,<s%> <S%H9266>Malcam,<s%>
And by <S%H2366>Hushim<s%> he <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H36>Abitub<s%> and <S%H508>Elpaal.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H508>Elpaal<s%> [were] <S%H5677>Eber,<s%> <S%H4936>Misham,<s%> and <S%H9612>Shemed,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H207>Ono<s%> and <S%H3850>Lod,<s%> with its <S%H1323>towns;<s%>

and <S%H1283>Beriah<s%> and <S%H8087>Shema,<s%> <S%H1992>who<s%> were <S%H7218>heads<s%> of fathers' [households] of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H357>Aijalon,<s%> <S%H1992>who<s%> <S%H1272>put<s%> to <S%H1272>flight<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath;<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> were <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the fathers' [households] according to their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H7218>men,<s%> <S%H428>who<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
Now in <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> [Jeiel,] the father of <S%H1>Gibeon<s%> <S%H1391>lived,<s%> and his wife's <S%H3427>name<s%> was <S%H8034>Maacah;<s%>

And <S%H4732>Mikloth<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8039>Shimeah.<s%> And they <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> with their <S%H251>relatives<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5048>opposite<s%> their [other] <S%H251>relatives.<s%>

And <S%H5369>Ner<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish,<s%> and <S%H7027>Kish<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> Malchi-shua, <S%H41>Abinadab,<s%> and <S%H792>Eshbaal.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> [was] Merib-baal, and Merib-baal <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah.<s%>

And <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3085>Jehoaddah,<s%> and <S%H3085>Jehoaddah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5964>Alemeth,<s%> <S%H5820>Azmaveth,<s%> and <S%H2174>Zimri;<s%> and <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4162>Moza.<s%>

And <S%H4162>Moza<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1150>Binea;<s%> <S%H9572>Raphah<s%> [was] his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H501>Eleasah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H682>Azel<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H682>Azel<s%> had <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> [were] their <S%H8034>names:<s%> <S%H5840>Azrikam,<s%> <S%H1074>Bocheru,<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> <S%H8187>Sheariah,<s%> <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> and <S%H2605>Hanan.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> [were] the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H682>Azel.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6232>Eshek<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> [were] <S%H198>Ulam<s%> his first-born, <S%H3266>Jeush<s%> the <S%H8145>second,<s%> and <S%H467>Eliphelet<s%> the <S%H7992>third.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H198>Ulam<s%> were <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> <S%H1869>archers,<s%> <S%H7198><s%> and <S%H7235>had<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1121>grandsons,<s%> 150 [of them.] <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> [were] of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>
